title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this code is to protect the public health. Food vending machines are to be maintained and operated in such a way as to avoid health hazards. (b) This code does not apply to machines rending merchandise other than food or beverages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
